#summary FB app

Add the following to your game:
  # *FB friends*: Load the user friends (their names and avatar URLs). 
  # *FB feed*: Use [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/dialogs/feed/ Feed dialog] to share the board image. In addition to adding the Share button, also open the share dialog when a user makes the winning move, to allow the user to brag about his win! (see [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/concepts/feed/ feed guidance]). 
  # *Send messages* : Use [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/dialogs/send/ Send dialog] to send an invite to a new user. 
  # *FB notifications*: Use [https://developers.facebook.com/docs/concepts/notifications/ Notifications] to tell an existing user that a move was made.
